briefdescription.para: Removes all form fields from this collection and from the document.
Returns the number of form fields in the collection.
Returns a form field by bookmark name.
Returns a form field at the specified index.

detaileddescription.para: Negative indexes are allowed and indicate access from the back of the collection. For example -1 means the last item, -2 means the second before last and so on.
If index is greater than or equal to the number of items in the list, this returns a null reference.
If index is negative and its absolute value is greater than the number of items in the list, this returns a null reference.

briefdescription.para: Removes a form field with the specified name.
Removes a form field at the specified index.
A collection of FormField objects that represent all the form fields in a range.
